articles.title: Gold Price Forecast: XAU/USD find demand after mixed S&P PMIs,US Dollar weakness - FXStreet
articles.description: The XAU/USD is finding traction in Friday's session, capitalising on mixed S&P PMIs and a weakening US Dollar.
articles.content:
• The XAU/USD sees a boost, ascending to the $2000 level.
